short_summary: Consultative services of a Psychologist to support policy development for the Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) Program
description: This procurement is conditionally set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). For more information on Indigenous business requirements of the Set-aside Program for Indigenous Business, refer to Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual. The intent of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to award one (1) contract for Consultative services of a Psychologist to support policy development for the Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) Program. The services will be on an as and when required basis. The initial contract period is for one (1) year from contract award, with up to two (2) additional one (1) year option periods. This RFP contains security requirements.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

### Title

Consultative Services for Policy Development for the Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) Program
=====================================

### Reference Number

cb-476-26709345

### Amendment Number

1

### Solicitation Number

1000242704-A

### Publication Date

2024-02-27

### Tender Closing Date

2024-03-18T14:00:00

### Amendment Date

2024-03-18

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreement**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

* **Region**: Canada

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Indigenous Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 9 Montclair Street, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 2E2, Canada

### Services Required

The procuring entity invites proposals from consultants to provide consultative services of a psychologist to support policy development for the Non-Insured Health Benefits (NIHB) Program. The services will be provided on an on-demand basis.

The initial contract period is for one year from the contract award, with up to two additional one-year option periods. The successful bidder will be required to meet the security requirements outlined in the RFP.

### Contact Information

For more information or to obtain a copy of the RFP, please contact:

Christine Madore
Indigenous Services Canada
Email: Christine.Madore@sac-isc.gc.ca
Phone: (873) 354-1376

### Attachments

* [Request for Proposal Document (RFP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32645/1000242704-a_rfp.pdf)
* [Notice of Delivery (NOD)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32645/1000242704-a_ddp.pdf)
